title: OCE so toxic
body: For some reason every game I play there is always people who are so toxic, this is making me think about quitting LoL for good and finding another game to play because everyone just argues and calls people who are not playing so well bad things. This is making me think I am wasting my time playing a game that I no longer enjoy and that I could be spending my time enjoying playing something else.

replies.body: its very toxic can always do the old ignore all and focus on playing just you, but then you lose the team aspect but i do find 9/10 games played are always toxic :(
you're right oce is the only server with toxic people, and no other game will have any kind of toxicity
